definitions: The act or process of articulating a sound or word.
The clear and distinct pronunciation of speech.
A joint or connection between bones or other parts.
The formation of a joint or the state of being jointed.
A point of connection between two things.
examples: The articulation of the elbow allows for movement.
He worked on his articulation during speech therapy.
The articulation between the two pipes was secure.
The articulation of ideas was impressive.
